# SKOverlay.Position.bottom

**Case**

Specifies that the overlay is at the bottom of the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
case bottom
```

## Describing the Overlay’s Position

- **SKOverlay.Position.bottomRaised**: Specifies that the overlay is at a raised position at the bottom of the screen.

items.description: Specifies that the overlay is at a raised position at the bottom of the screen.
items.name: SKOverlay.Position.bottomRaised

title: SKOverlay.Position.bottom
